EmailTemplate.name: Content Syndication Lead Gen - Q118.Selling Simplified Lead Email - Security - 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary ebooks, white papers, infographics, webinars, and events
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We noticed that you recently checked out one of our white papers, so we thought we’d check-in and offer up some additional complimentary materials.
Feel free to peruse at your leisure:
- Topic Page: Cloud-Native Security <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - Video: Why cloud-native enterprise security matters <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/why-cloud-native-enterprise-security-matters-matt-stine-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - Analyst Report: The Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - eBook: Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/crafting-your-cloud-native-strategy?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - Podcast: Cloud-Native Security & the Three R's, with Justin Smith <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/cloud-native-security-the-three-rs-with-justin-smith-ep-68?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]>
None of these strike your fancy? Go to our Resources Page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> for a whole plethora of white papers, case studies, webinars, customer stories, and more. Or stay up to date with Pivotal news by subscribing to our weekly newsletter here <[[https://pivotal.io/newsletter-subscription?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]>.
And if you don’t want to hear from us, we understand - you can always unsubscribe from receiving these emails here <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/ToAIA000v0000UX20N00CJ0]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>.
